definition: Daming Lake in Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2], Shandong
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]

sentences.english: Our apartment is on the sixteenth floor, its window overlooking Daming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们的公寓在第十六楼，从窗子里可以俯瞰大明湖。

sentences.english: While the springs to the stream of Daming Lake, nature also become more and more beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 而众泉归流的大明湖，自然也愈发的美丽了。

sentences.english: Large Siminghu a long history, stunning scenery and landmarks Zhouza the meantime.
sentences.chinese: 大明湖历史悠久，景色秀美，名胜古迹周匝其间。

sentences.english: One day, the lake will become a completely free and beautiful scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 的某一天，大明湖会成为一完全自由的美丽风景区。

sentences.english: We take a motor car to JiNan East Railway Station, take taxi to Daming Lake park.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐动车到济南东站后，打的到大明湖公园。
